mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, LOGIN_ID,PASSWORD, EMAIL, DATE_FORMAT(CREATED_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') CREATED_DATE, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL,PHONE_NUMBER, RECEIVE_SMS FROM OP_USER AS A JOIN OP_USER_DETAIL AS B ON A.ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY ID DESC
